sentences.sentence: Stay close with your colleagues to meet new clients to demonstrate team sprit.
sentences.translation: 为了体现团队精神，一直和同事一起认识新客户。

sentences.sentence: Please compete in the sprit of Olympic values: excellence, friendship and respect.
sentences.translation: 请大家本着奥林匹克的价值和精神，即卓越、友谊和尊重，投身于比赛。

sentences.sentence: It is two America but also the same America which displays the two sides of America sprit.
sentences.translation: 这是两个美国，也是同一个美国，分别体现了美国精神的两个侧面。
